title: How to Temporarily Remove Ads on Coolmath

steps.headline: Go to a Coolmath Game.
steps.description: Jelly Truck, a popular Coolmath game, can be found here: www.coolmath-games.com/0-jelly-truck

steps.headline: Right click and select "Inspect".
steps.description: Some browsers also call this "Inspect Element." This is where you will edit the website and get rid of the ads.

steps.headline: Press Ctrl+F and type in ad-wrapper.
steps.description: This is the section name that Coolmath sticks ads into. Your could also search for advertisement.

steps.headline: Right click and press Delete element.
steps.description: This will remove the entire section, removing the add altogether. You can also just press the Delete key.

steps.headline: Go to the next ad-wrapper and delete it.
steps.description: Keep doing this until all the ads are deleted. There should be 4-6 ads.

steps.headline: Go back and enjoy your ad-free game!

text: Go to a Coolmath Game. Jelly Truck, a popular Coolmath game, can be found here: www.coolmath-games.com/0-jelly-truck Right click and select "Inspect". Some browsers also call this "Inspect Element." This is where you will edit the website and get rid of the ads. Press Ctrl+F and type in ad-wrapper. This is the section name that Coolmath sticks ads into. Your could also search for advertisement. Right click and press Delete element. This will remove the entire section, removing the add altogether. You can also just press the Delete key. Go to the next ad-wrapper and delete it. Keep doing this until all the ads are deleted. There should be 4-6 ads. Go back and enjoy your ad-free game!
